name: FRIEND'S FOUNDATION
briefDescription: FRIENDS MINISTRIES is a non-profitable, non-political voluntary trust. It has head quarter at Kadwan, Nandurbar district of Maharashtra state, India. A group of like-minded people well versed with various socio-economic problems of the poor has came forward with one vision to start an organization’s aiming at development of poor especially targeting the poor who fall under poverty line. We have been working initially spreading the word of the God to these ignorant people, since 2012 and got registered the Organization as “FRIENDS FOUNDATION” in the year 2013. We are working for the community development in all aspects.The main aim to start this Association is to bring holistic development (socio-economic, Physical, Educational and Spiritu
